tool.help:
.. class:: donemark
**What it does**
miRNA duplication for expansions of miRNA family is one of the modes of their evolution. This function can be used to identify miRNA duplication events by means of Whole Genome Duplication and others types of duplication.
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- **The sequences and coordinates of protein-coding genes** - **miRNA annotation file from miRNAnnotation or miRNACuration**
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
The duplication events of miRNAs and miRNA pairs in syntenic blocks.
